content: Created `pyproject.toml` with PEP 621 project metadata plus pinned-enough `jsonschema` and `pytest` configuration to support reproducible CI test runs.

output.code:
from pathlib import Path
import json

target_path = Path('/mnt/data').joinpath('pyproject.toml')
target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

chunks = [
"""[build-system]
requires = ["setuptools>=68", "wheel"]
build-backend = "setuptools.build_meta"

[project]
name = "generated_configuration_1766429804913"
version = "0.1.0"
description = "Reproducible benchmark schema + computation validation harness."
readme = "outputs/README.md"
requires-python = ">=3.10"
license = {text = "MIT"}
authors = [{name = "OpenAI", email = "noreply@openai.com"}]
dependencies = [
  "jsonschema>=4.21",
]

[project.optional-dependencies]
test = [
  "pytest>=8.0",
]

[tool.pytest.ini_options]
minversion = "8.0"
addopts = "-q"
testpaths = ["tests"]
pythonpath = ["."]

[tool.setuptools]
include-package-data = true

[tool.setuptools.packages.find]
where = ["."]
exclude = ["outputs*", ".github*", "tests*"]"""
]

final_text = '\n'.join(block.strip('\n') for block in chunks).strip() + '\n'
target_path.write_text(final_text, encoding='utf-8')

print('FILE_WRITTEN:pyproject.toml')
print('DIR_STATE:' + json.dumps(sorted(str(p.relative_to(Path("/mnt/data"))) for p in target_path.parent.glob('*') if p.is_file())))

content.text: Created `pyproject.toml` with PEP 621 project metadata plus pinned-enough `jsonschema` and `pytest` configuration to support reproducible CI test runs.
